import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from '../services/api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-all-products', templateUrl: './all-products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./all-products.component.css'] }) export class AllProductsComponent implements OnInit{ allProducts:any=[] constructor(private api:ApiService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.api.getAllProductsAPI().subscribe((res)=>{ this.allProducts=res }) } }
Product.name
$40.00 - $80.00
